subject: Re: EVP Maker
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Stephen,

I think Frank Sumption used that program during his early 
investigations. He may have an opinion for you.

- Mike

>
> Has anyone tried the program EVP Maker ?

continuing 
> investigation of an old house.

> Stephen ..
